titleStmt.title: Reports in the Court of Exchequer, beginning in the third, and ending in the ninth year of the raign of the late King James by the Honourable Richard Lane ... ; being the first collections in that court hitherto extant ; containing severall cases of informations upon intrusion, touching the King's prerogative, revenue and government, with divers incident resolutions of publique concernment in points of law ; with two exact alphabeticall tables, the one of the names of the cases, the other of the principall matters contained in this book.
titleStmt.author: Lane, Richard, Sir, 1584-1650.
England and Wales. Court of Exchequer.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Lee, D. Pakeman, and G. Bedell ...,

notesStmt.note: "Jenkins, although it contains earlier cases, was not published until 1661." Cf. Soule, Lawyer's ref. manual, 1884.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
